panel.title: Combined All Calls With Status Codes

search.query: `wso2_wmf(APIGatewayRequestCompleted)`request.detail.apiContext="*vat" | fields eventId request.detail.applicationProductionClientId response.detail.statusCode | dedup eventId | rename request.detail.applicationProductionClientId AS ClientID response.detail.statusCode AS statusCode | lookup consumercalls.csv ClientID OUTPUT Developer | chart count BY ClientID statusCode | addtotals fieldname="All" | eval Successful = 0 | foreach 1* 2* 300 301 302 303 [ eval Successful = Successful + coalesce('<<FIELD>>', 0) ] | eval Unsuccessful = All - Successful | table ClientID All Successful Unsuccessful *

`wso2_wmf(APIGatewayRequestCompleted)`request.detail.apiContext=*vat "request.detail.method"=GET OR "request.detail.method"=POST request.tags.path="*vat/*/payments*" OR request.tags.path="*vat/*/obligations*" OR request.tags.path="*vat/*/liabilities*" OR request.tags.path="*vat/*/returns/*" OR request.tags.path="*vat/*/returns" | fields request.detail.apiContext eventId date_mday request.tags.path request.detail.applicationProductionClientId | replace "organisations/*" with * in request.detail.apiContext | dedup eventId date_mday | eval end_obligations=case('request.tags.path' like "%obligations%", 1), end_liabilities=case('request.tags.path' like "%liabilities%", 1), end_payments=case('request.tags.path' like "%payments%", 1), end_retrieve=case('request.tags.path' like "%returns/%", 1), end_submit=case('request.tags.path' like "%returns", 1) | rename request.detail.applicationProductionClientId AS ClientID | fillnull value=0 | eval newtime=strftime(_time,"%B") | eval month=strftime(_time,"%m") | lookup consumercalls.csv ClientID OUTPUT Developer | stats sum(end_obligations) AS obligations sum(end_liabilities) AS liabilities sum(end_payments) AS payments sum(end_retrieve) AS retrieve sum(end_submit) AS submit BY newtime month ClientID | eval newtime = newtime . " Total" | sort month | streamstats dc(newtime) AS _serial | multireport [ rename newtime AS _newtime ] [ stats sum(*) AS * first(_serial) AS _serial BY newtime | rename newtime AS _newtime `comment("This adds the "Totals" text to the Developer field")` | eval ClientID = _newtime ] | sort 0 BY _serial | fields - newtime month

`wso2_wmf(APIGatewayRequestCompleted)` "request.detail.apiContext"=*vat | fields request.detail.apiContext request.detail.applicationProductionClientId eventId | replace "organisations/*" with * in request.detail.apiContext | rename request.detail.applicationProductionClientId AS ClientID | dedup eventId ClientID | lookup consumercalls.csv ClientID OUTPUT Developer | fillnull value=0 | eval fcall=strftime(_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") | eval lcall=strftime(_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") | stats earliest(fcall) AS "First Call" latest(lcall) AS "Last Call" BY ClientID

`wso2_wmf(APIGatewayRequestCompleted)`request.detail.apiContext=*vat "request.detail.method"=GET request.tags.path="*vat/*/payments*" OR request.tags.path="*vat/*/obligations*" OR request.tags.path="*vat/*/liabilities*" | fields request.tags.path response.detail.statusCode | eval pathvalue=if(like('request.tags.path', "%payments%"), "Payments", if(like('request.tags.path', "%obligations%"), "Obligations", if(like('request.tags.path', "%liabilities%"), "Liabilities", ""))) | rename response.detail.statusCode AS "Status Code" | chart count BY pathvalue "Status Code" | addtotals fieldname="All"

| multisearch [ search `wso2_wmf(APIGatewayRequestCompleted)`request.detail.apiContext=*vat response.detail.statusCode=403] [ search `vat-api_wmf(RequestReceived)` detail.statusCode=403] | eval RequestID=coalesce('request.tags.X-Request-ID','tags.X-Request-ID') | eval StatusCode=coalesce('detail.statusCode','response.detail.statusCode') | rename request.detail.applicationProductionClientId AS ClientID | lookup consumercalls.csv ClientID OUTPUT Developer | dedup eventId | bucket span=1m _time | stats values(ClientID) AS ClientID values(detail.responseMessage) AS Response BY RequestID _time | stats count BY Response

`wso2_wmf(APIGatewayRequestFailedDueToApplicationSpecificRateLimit)` detail.apiContext=*vat | fields detail.apiContext eventId detail.applicationProductionClientId | replace "organisations/*" with * in detail.apiContext | dedup eventId | rename detail.applicationProductionClientId AS ClientID | lookup consumercalls.csv ClientID OUTPUT Developer | fillnull value=0 | stats count AS All BY ClientID
